name: Mother's Lighter
description:
Mother’s Lighter

You wake sick one day and you start to notice strange things about your mother. You then start to discover something wrong about the place in which you live.

Controls

W – Moving up on ladders

S – Moving down on ladders

A – Moving Left

D – Moving Right

E/Left mouse click – Lighter

Use Mouse for dialog controls and progression

Art/Music done by us

Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/cocophony
